entries.source: Requires restart of Obsidian. If enabled, when the cursor is in a table, enter advances to the next row. Disabling this can help avoid conflicting with tag or CJK autocompletion. If disabling, bind "Go to ..." in the Obsidian Hotkeys settings.
entries.translated: Requires restart of Obsidian. If enabled, when the cursor is in a table, enter advances to the next row. Disabling this can help avoid conflicting with tag or CJK autocompletion. If disabling, bind "Go to ..." in the Obsidian Hotkeys settings.

entries.source: Requires restart of Obsidian. If enabled, when the cursor is in a table, tab/shift+tab navigate between cells. Disabling this can help avoid conflicting with tag or CJK autocompletion. If disabling, bind "Go to ..." in the Obsidian Hotkeys settings.
entries.translated: Requires restart of Obsidian. If enabled, when the cursor is in a table, tab/shift+tab navigate between cells. Disabling this can help avoid conflicting with tag or CJK autocompletion. If disabling, bind "Go to ..." in the Obsidian Hotkeys settings.

entries.source: If enabled, table cells will have spaces added to match the width of the longest cell in the column.
entries.translated: If enabled, table cells will have spaces added to match the width of the longest cell in the column.

entries.source: If enabled, a button which opens the table controls toolbar will be added to the Obsidian sidebar. The toolbar can also be opened with a Hotkey. Changes only take effect on reload.
entries.translated: If enabled, a button which opens the table controls toolbar will be added to the Obsidian sidebar. The toolbar can also be opened with a Hotkey. Changes only take effect on reload.

entries.source: If this plugin adds value for you and you would like to help support continued development, please use the buttons below:
entries.translated: If this plugin adds value for you and you would like to help support continued development, please use the buttons below:
